title: The Designer Bags Everyone Is Talking About This Season
excerpt: Whether they’re from famed luxury houses or up-and-coming designers, we’ve seen all the best designer bags. These are the ones worth your money.
text: Celebrity-ApprovedCoach Brooklyn Shoulder BagWith an under-$300 price point, a timeless, everyday hobo silhouette, and Bella Hadid’s seal of approval, I can’t think of a reason not to have this bag in your regular rotation.Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 3.25 inchesColors: 8 optionsMaterial: Natural grain leatherBelted PerfectionPrada Buckle Small Leather Handbag With BeltAnd now, the bag I personally cannot get out of my mind. Prada’s belted bag seems to embody all that Prada is: modern and unexpected yet inherently classic. The silhouette of this leather top-handle style is undoubtedly timeless, but that belted detail gives it that extra something that makes it stand out—plus, I especially love this bright white hue for the colder months. Oh, and by the way: several versions of this bag were seen on the label’s spring/summer 2025 runway, so you know this is a good investment.Dimensions: Height: 9.05 inches; width: 12.2 inches; depth: 4.33 inchesColors: White/Black, Black, Caramel, Clay GrayMaterial: LeatherAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowInstagram-ReadyMiu Miu Aventure Suede Shoulder BagFrom the runway to my heart—and every Instagram photo in between—this bag now lives rent-free in my mind. It’s incredibly chic on its own, thanks to that caramel-brown hue. However, it’s just as cool with some bright and colorful beads, ties, or charms—the world is your oyster for making it your own.Dimensions: Height: 8.8 inches; width: 17.3 inches; depth: 5.7 inchesColors: Brown, GreenMaterial: Lamb leatherThe Everyday CarryTory Burch Romy Hobo BagYou’ve likely heard of Tory Burch’s Romy Tote, which is worthy of anyone’s wardrobe. However, for those who prefer a more streamlined, minimalist approach from the brand, the Romy Hobo is the perfect option. With an adjustable strap and a silhouette that fits the curve of your shoulder, this will be the essential everyday bag for all your essentials with some space to spare.Dimensions: Height: 14.6 inches; width: 11.8 inches; depth: 4.9 inchesColors: Black, Light Cream, Wild Mushroom, TiramisuMaterial: Pebbled leatherAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Unexpected ChoiceBottega Veneta Baby SardineI don’t know too many women who would forgo the option of a hands-free lifestyle with the help of a chic crossbody bag. This has the polish that Bottega is known for but with a quirky touch, thanks to the sardine-shaped handle.Dimensions: Height: 4.7 inches; width: 7.9 inches; depth: 1 inchColors: Barolo, Black, Sapele, ChalkMaterial: LeatherModern MarvelLoewe Medium Squeeze BagWhile Loewe is no novice in making high-quality designer bags, the Spanish heritage brand has consistently been a top, must-have label (and bags) in recent years. Its hottest silhouette is the Squeeze—which is equal parts sophistication and whimsy. It comes in a wide range of eye-catching colors, but I’m particularly fond of this olive green hue for the colder months.Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 13.4 inches; depth: 5.3 inchesColors: 8 optionsMaterial: Mellow nappa lambskinAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Boho-Chic StapleChloé Bracelet Bag MiniBy now, you already know—boho is back. So, why not get yourself a designer bag from one of the luxury brands that does it best?Dimensions: Height: 5.5 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 3.9 inchesColors: Black, Clay Brown, Vegetal Beige, Sea Grass, WoodroseMaterial: Shiny-grained calfskin leatherThe Cool-Girl OptionGucci B Medium Shoulder BagGucci’s take on the slouchy, hobo-esque silhouette—which was inspired by a 1950s shape—gives a new perspective on quiet luxury. The logo-less design is undoubtedly polished, but that soft and supple leather gives it an ease that makes it perfect for an everyday shoulder bag.Dimensions: Height: 18.2 inches; width: 19.3 inches; depth: 1.6 inchesColors: Light brownMaterials: SuedeAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Sleek Hobo BagSaint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Small HoboI love hobo bags—so much that I wrote an entire story on them so you (and I) can shop the best hobo bags of the moment. Of course, you’re here for a reason, which means you’re likely looking for a designer option that is well worth your dollars. Saint Laurent’s offering [pictured here] is perfectly slouchy and will work well as an everyday leather tote.Dimensions: Height: 6.7 inches; width: 10.2 inches; depth: 4.3 inchesColors: Black, Light Mask, Crema Soft, RedMaterial: Leather with suede liningThe East-West It BagAlaïa Le Teckel Suede East/West ClutchOh, how the Alaïa Le Teckel silhouette has captured the hearts of fashion lovers everywhere. If you’ve been keeping an eye on fashion’s must-have It items, no doubt you’ve seen the French fashion house’s shoulder bag, but its equally chic east-west style is the latest rendition I’ve been noticing among my peers and icons, which is leading me to believe that this is the next version on the fashion set’s watchlist. When I asked our assistant accessories editor, Madison Rexroat, what she’s thinking for must-have designer bags, she said, “any Khaite bag, really.” One particular bag I’ve been spotting everywhere is the Simona—which is especially cool in this snake print. The size is perfect to hold all of my daily essentials along with a 13-inch laptop—its bucket silhouette feels elevated but casual enough for everyday occasions, and the strap sits comfortably on my shoulder. I opted for a pretty winter white, but it comes in six other colors, including two vibrant ones: orange and green.Dimensions: Height: 11.8 inches; width: 10.2 inches; 5.1 inchesColors: 6 optionsMaterial: Grained leatherThe Day ClutchToteme T-Lock Leather Clutch“In the not-too-big and not-too-small department, Toteme’s T-Lock bag reigns supreme. I’m also a huge fan of the versatility of this bag as its clutch design is fancy enough for evenings, while the structured finish and roomier size make it a polished grab for everyday wear.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadDimensions: Height: 3.5 inches; width: 5.5 inches; depth: 3.5 inchesColors: Milk Grain, Black, TanMaterial: LeatherAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowSlouched SophisticationFendi Peekaboo Soft Medium Tote BagIn case you haven’t heard, slouchy is in—and what better way to take on the trend than with this soft take on Fendi’s classic Peekabo? This will have the perfectly worn-in look of a well-loved bag without all the wear.Dimensions: Height: 10 inches; width: 13 inches; depth: 4 inchesColors: Black, BeigeMaterial: LeatherRabanne Nano Sparkle Sequins Shoulder Bag“A paillette Paco Rabanne bag is perfect for any season, especially for those of us whose style sways towards maximalism. It’ll catch the light on sizzling summer days and will also sparkle and shimmer on glamorous winter nights. It might read like a Y2K trend piece, but this bag has been around—and will be around—way longer than any trend.”—Madison Rexroat, fashion and accessories assistant.Dimensions: Height: 16 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 2.5 inchesColors: SilverMaterial: Mirrored discs
html:
Celebrity-Approved

Coach Brooklyn Shoulder Bag

With an under-$300 price point, a timeless, everyday hobo silhouette, and Bella Hadid’s seal of approval, I can’t think of a reason not to have this bag in your regular rotation.

Dimensions: Height: 11 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 3.25 inches

Colors: 8 options

Material: Natural grain leather

Belted Perfection

Prada Buckle Small Leather Handbag With Belt

And now, the bag I personally cannot get out of my mind. Prada’s belted bag seems to embody all that Prada is: modern and unexpected yet inherently classic. The silhouette of this leather top-handle style is undoubtedly timeless, but that belted detail gives it that extra something that makes it stand out—plus, I especially love this bright white hue for the colder months. Oh, and by the way: several versions of this bag were seen on the label’s spring/summer 2025 runway, so you know this is a good investment.

Dimensions: Height: 9.05 inches; width: 12.2 inches; depth: 4.33 inches

Colors: White/Black, Black, Caramel, Clay Gray

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Instagram-Ready

Miu Miu Aventure Suede Shoulder Bag

From the runway to my heart—and every Instagram photo in between—this bag now lives rent-free in my mind. It’s incredibly chic on its own, thanks to that caramel-brown hue. However, it’s just as cool with some bright and colorful beads, ties, or charms—the world is your oyster for making it your own.

Dimensions: Height: 8.8 inches; width: 17.3 inches; depth: 5.7 inches

Colors: Brown, Green

Material: Lamb leather

The Everyday Carry

Tory Burch Romy Hobo Bag

You’ve likely heard of Tory Burch’s Romy Tote, which is worthy of anyone’s wardrobe. However, for those who prefer a more streamlined, minimalist approach from the brand, the Romy Hobo is the perfect option. With an adjustable strap and a silhouette that fits the curve of your shoulder, this will be the essential everyday bag for all your essentials with some space to spare.

Dimensions: Height: 14.6 inches; width: 11.8 inches; depth: 4.9 inches

Colors: Black, Light Cream, Wild Mushroom, Tiramisu

Material: Pebbled leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Unexpected Choice

Bottega Veneta Baby Sardine

I don’t know too many women who would forgo the option of a hands-free lifestyle with the help of a chic crossbody bag. This has the polish that Bottega is known for but with a quirky touch, thanks to the sardine-shaped handle.

Dimensions: Height: 4.7 inches; width: 7.9 inches; depth: 1 inch

Colors: Barolo, Black, Sapele, Chalk

Material: Leather

Modern Marvel

Loewe Medium Squeeze Bag

While Loewe is no novice in making high-quality designer bags, the Spanish heritage brand has consistently been a top, must-have label (and bags) in recent years. Its hottest silhouette is the Squeeze—which is equal parts sophistication and whimsy. It comes in a wide range of eye-catching colors, but I’m particularly fond of this olive green hue for the colder months.

Dimensions: Height: 13 inches; width: 13.4 inches; depth: 5.3 inches

Colors: 8 options

Material: Mellow nappa lambskin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Boho-Chic Staple

Chloé Bracelet Bag Mini

By now, you already know—boho is back. So, why not get yourself a designer bag from one of the luxury brands that does it best?

Dimensions: Height: 5.5 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 3.9 inches

Colors: Black, Clay Brown, Vegetal Beige, Sea Grass, Woodrose

Material: Shiny-grained calfskin leather

The Cool-Girl Option

Gucci B Medium Shoulder Bag

Gucci’s take on the slouchy, hobo-esque silhouette—which was inspired by a 1950s shape—gives a new perspective on quiet luxury. The logo-less design is undoubtedly polished, but that soft and supple leather gives it an ease that makes it perfect for an everyday shoulder bag.

Dimensions: Height: 18.2 inches; width: 19.3 inches; depth: 1.6 inches

Colors: Light brown

Materials: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Sleek Hobo Bag

Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Small Hobo

I love hobo bags—so much that I wrote an entire story on them so you (and I) can shop the best hobo bags of the moment. Of course, you’re here for a reason, which means you’re likely looking for a designer option that is well worth your dollars. Saint Laurent’s offering [pictured here] is perfectly slouchy and will work well as an everyday leather tote.

Dimensions: Height: 6.7 inches; width: 10.2 inches; depth: 4.3 inches

Colors: Black, Light Mask, Crema Soft, Red

Material: Leather with suede lining

The East-West It Bag

Alaïa Le Teckel Suede East/West Clutch

Oh, how the Alaïa Le Teckel silhouette has captured the hearts of fashion lovers everywhere. If you’ve been keeping an eye on fashion’s must-have It items, no doubt you’ve seen the French fashion house’s shoulder bag, but its equally chic east-west style is the latest rendition I’ve been noticing among my peers and icons, which is leading me to believe that this is the next version on the fashion set’s watchlist.

Dimensions: Height: 4 inches; width: 12.25 inches; depth: 2.75 inches

Colors: Noir, Rouge Grenat

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chic and Sustainable

Stella McCartney Ryder Faux Suede Crossbody Bag

Honestly, I can’t stop thinking about this purse. It feels like an unexpected take on the doctor bag trend that’s been bubbling up this spring, and this light khaki green color is the right amount of neutral without feeling like your standard black, white, brown, or beige bag. And, if I may add, the silhouette seems prime for a chic scarf or charm.

Dimensions: Height: 7.5 inches; width: 14 inches; depth: 6.5 inches

Colors: Khaki

Material: Synthetic

The Rising Star

Savette Symmetry Pochette Suede Top Handle Bag

This elegant top-handle bag is the under-the-radar bag that’s seemingly everywhere among the most stylish women I know. Currently an IYKYK-type brand, you’ll no doubt be seen as the ahead-of-the-trend woman in your friend group.

Dimensions: Height: 9 inches; width: 5 inches; depth: 3 inches

Colors: Sepia, Camellia

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Pop of Red

Ferragamo Medium Hug Handbag

There’s something so charming about this bag—most likely the fact that it’s called the Hug bag, with its little leather arms and whatnot. But in the classic Ferragamo shade of red, I can’t help but also describe this as downright sexy. Hey, the best of both worlds. Of course, if this Flame Red isn’t your thing, it also comes in a variety of neutral shades like black, olive, and navy. I also wore this beauty during New York Fashion Week adorned with personalized bag charms, and I have to tell you: It got all the compliments.

Dimensions: Height: 8.5 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 7.5 inches

Colors: Flame Red

Material: Leather

The Ultra-Chic Work Tote

Liffner Belted Suede Bucket Bag

We all love suede—right? This supple everyday tote is just the thing to give your everyday ensembles a sophisticated touch—with a twist in the form of that elongated buckle. Plus, this bag is big enough to serve as your work tote, with enough room to fit a 13-inch laptop and more.

Dimensions: Height: 15.5 inches; width: 14 inches; depth: 7 inches

Colors: Dark Brown, Cinnamon

Material: Suede

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Animal Print Statement

Khaite Simona Shoulder Bag

It’s no secret that the ELLE fashion team loves Khaite, which makes some of the best accessories overall. When I asked our assistant accessories editor, Madison Rexroat, what she’s thinking for must-have designer bags, she said, “any Khaite bag, really.” One particular bag I’ve been spotting everywhere is the Simona—which is especially cool in this snake print. The quality is amazing, and the aesthetic is sleek enough to go with any outfit, which means it’ll be a great investment when you think about the cost per wear.

Dimensions: Height: 9.8 inches; width: 22 inches; depth: 9.8 inches

Colors: Cedar

Material: Suede

The Luxury Tote

The Row Medium North South Park Tote Bag

There’s no denying it: The Row makes good bags. I know there’s a particular style that’s been selling out for the past year—and understandably so, it’s beautiful. But in case you want another option, this sleek and simple tote is just what the doctor ordered.

Dimensions: Height: 16 inches; width: 11 inches; depth: 6 inches

Colors: Chestnut

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bucket Beauty

Longchamp Le Roseau M Shoulder Bag Paper

I own this bag—and can I just say, it completely eclipsed my go-to work tote the moment I got it (and trust me, I was not expecting that). The size is perfect to hold all of my daily essentials along with a 13-inch laptop—its bucket silhouette feels elevated but casual enough for everyday occasions, and the strap sits comfortably on my shoulder. I opted for a pretty winter white, but it comes in six other colors, including two vibrant ones: orange and green.

Dimensions: Height: 11.8 inches; width: 10.2 inches; 5.1 inches

Colors: 6 options

Material: Grained leather

The Day Clutch

Toteme T-Lock Leather Clutch

“In the not-too-big and not-too-small department, Toteme’s T-Lock bag reigns supreme. I’m also a huge fan of the versatility of this bag as its clutch design is fancy enough for evenings, while the structured finish and roomier size make it a polished grab for everyday wear.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Dimensions: Height: 3.5 inches; width: 5.5 inches; depth: 3.5 inches

Colors: Milk Grain, Black, Tan

Material: Leather

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Slouched Sophistication

Fendi Peekaboo Soft Medium Tote Bag

In case you haven’t heard, slouchy is in—and what better way to take on the trend than with this soft take on Fendi’s classic Peekabo? This will have the perfectly worn-in look of a well-loved bag without all the wear.

Dimensions: Height: 10 inches; width: 13 inches; depth: 4 inches

Colors: Black, Beige

Material: Leather

Rabanne Nano Sparkle Sequins Shoulder Bag

“A paillette Paco Rabanne bag is perfect for any season, especially for those of us whose style sways towards maximalism. It’ll catch the light on sizzling summer days and will also sparkle and shimmer on glamorous winter nights. It might read like a Y2K trend piece, but this bag has been around—and will be around—way longer than any trend.”—Madison Rexroat, fashion and accessories assistant.

Dimensions: Height: 16 inches; width: 12.5 inches; depth: 2.5 inches

Colors: Silver

Material: Mirrored discs
